Class TripManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • TripManager

  • public class TripManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for managing uber trips.
    Author:
    Michael Hilomen

      TripManager()
      Instantiates a new trip manager.

      finds nearest drivers based on nearest distance

      Checks if client has enough money to pay the fare
      void reportTrip()
      creates a report.txt file containing final driver and client information, as well as total transactions and trips.
      void run()
      Runs all trips based on all drivers and passengers

      Runs a single valid trip.

      Runs a failed trip

      • hasEnoughMoney

        public boolean hasEnoughMoney(Client client,
                              Driver driver)
        Checks if client has enough money to pay the fare
        Parameters:
        client - client to check for fare money
        driver - driver intended for client
        Returns:
        true if client has enough funds, false otherwise.
